instructions: From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the Menu icon (top right). Tap Settings . Under 'Advanced,' tap Privacy . Tap CLEAR BROWSING DATA. Tap the check boxes for data you want to clear: Browsing history Cache Cookies, site data Saved passwords Autofill data Tap CLEAR .
From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the Menu icon (top right). Tap New tab .
From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the X on any open tab to close it.
From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the Menu icon (top right). Tap Settings . Under 'Advanced,' tap Site settings. Tap JavaScript . Tap the JavaScript slider on or off.

Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 1 1 Disconnect all Ethernet connections from the computer. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 2 2 Connect the iPhone to the computer using the iPhone's USB cable. Tap Settings > General > Network on the iPhone home screen. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 3 3 Select Internet tethering and turn it on. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 4 4 On the computer, go to the Network Settings. Disable all active connections except for the new iPhone connection. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 5 5 On the iPhone, select connect via USB when prompted. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 6 6 Connect your PS3 to your computer with an Ethernet cable. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 7 7 Return to Network Connections on your computer. Highlight both your iPhone connection and LAN connection. Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 8 8 Right click on a connection and select "bridge connection. " Image titled Easily Share iPhone 3G Internet Connection With Windows XP and Your PS3 Step 9 9 Turn on your PS3 and go to its network settings. Select Internet settings and select the easy setup choice, then follow the prompts and save settings. If this does not work try the custom setting method and keep hitting X until you get to the test settings screen. You should now be fully connected. Advertisement
